name: The Ice Road
desc: After a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada, a 'big-rig' ice road driver must lead an impossible rescue mission over a frozen lake to save the trapped miners.

name: EuroTrip
desc: Dumped by his girlfriend, a high school grad decides to embark on an overseas adventure in Europe with his friends.

name: Road Trip
desc: Four college buddies embark on a road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a female friend.

name: Inside Man
desc: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

name: The Bonfire of the Vanities
desc: After his mistress runs over a young teen, a Wall Street hotshot sees his life unravel in the spotlight and attracts the interest of a down-and-out reporter.

name: He Got Game
desc: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

name: Insomnia
desc: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

name: Wrath of Man
desc: A cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving a lot of money around Los Angeles each week.

name: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
desc: When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he ever imagined.

name: Meet the Parents
desc: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

name: Carlito's Way
desc: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

name: Anger Management
desc: Dave Buznik is a businessman who is wrongly sentenced to an anger management program, where he meets an aggressive instructor.

name: High Plains Drifter
desc: A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

name: Sleepers
desc: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized. Thirteen years later, an unexpected random encounter with a former guard gives them a chance for revenge.

name: The Book of Eli
desc: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

name: The Jackal
desc: An imprisoned I.R.A. fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

name: Burn After Reading
desc: A disk containing mysterious information from a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous and daft gym employees who attempt to sell it.

name: Sahara
desc: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

name: What Men Want
desc: A woman is boxed out by the male sports agents in her profession, but gains an unexpected edge over them when she develops the ability to hear men's thoughts.

name: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka
desc: In this parody of blaxploitation movies, a black hero wannabe reunites former black heroes from the 70s to help him get revenge on Mr. Big.

name: Cape Fear
desc: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

name: Glory
desc: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

name: Sea of Love
desc: A detective investigating a series of murders becomes involved with a woman who may be the culprit.

name: Sicario
desc: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

name: Horrible Bosses 2
desc: Dale, Kurt and Nick decide to start their own business but things don't go as planned because of a slick investor, prompting the trio to pull off a harebrained and misguided kidnapping scheme.

name: Horrible Bosses
desc: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

name: Margin Call
desc: Follows the key people at an investment bank over a 24-hour period during the early stages of the 2008 financial crisis.

name: The Little Things
desc: Kern County Deputy Sheriff Joe Deacon is sent to Los Angeles for what should have been a quick evidence-gathering assignment. Instead, he becomes embroiled in the search for a serial killer who is terrorizing the city.

name: Plastic
desc: Sam and Fordy run a credit card fraud scheme, but when they steal from the wrong man, they find themselves threatened by a sadistic gangster. They need to raise £2m and pull off a daring diamond heist to clear their debt.

name: Now You See Me
desc: An F.B.I. Agent and an Interpol Detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances, and reward their audiences with the money.

name: The Last Castle
desc: A court-martialed General rallies together twelve hundred inmates to rise against a corrupt and sadistic warden.

name: There Will Be Blood
desc: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

name: Half Baked
desc: The story of three not so bright men who come up with a series of crazy schemes to get a friend out of jail.

name: Knives Out
desc: A detective investigates the death of the patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.
A simple yet proud farmer in the year 1922 conspires to murder his wife for financial gain, convincing his teenage son to assist. But their actions have unintended consequences.

name: The Devil All the Time
desc: Sinister characters converge around a young man devoted to protecting those he loves in a postwar backwoods town teeming with corruption and brutality.

name: Rush Hour
desc: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

name: Blue Streak
desc: A former convict poses as a cop to retrieve a diamond he stole years ago.

name: Old School
desc: Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.

name: We're the Millers
desc: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.

name: Ted 2
desc: Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.

name: Ted
desc: John Bennett, a man whose childhood wish of bringing his teddy bear to life came true, now must decide between keeping the relationship with the bear, Ted or his girlfriend, Lori.

name: The Hangover Part III
desc: When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the run.

name: The Hangover
desc: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

name: The Hangover Part II
desc: Two years after the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding. Stu's plan for a subdued pre-wedding brunch, however, goes seriously awry.

name: Burnt
desc: Adam Jones is a chef who destroyed his career with drugs and diva behavior. He cleans up and returns to London, determined to redeem himself by spearheading a top restaurant that can gain three Michelin stars.

name: Chef
desc: A head chef quits his restaurant job and buys a food truck in an effort to reclaim his creative promise, while piecing back together his estranged family.

name: The Judge
desc: Big-city lawyer Hank Palmer returns to his childhood home where his father, the town's judge, is suspected of murder. Hank sets out to discover the truth; along the way he reconnects with his estranged family.

name: U.S. Marshals
desc: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

name: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
desc: The fragile peace between apes and humans is threatened as mistrust and betrayal threaten to plunge both tribes into a war for dominance over the Earth.

name: War for the Planet of the Apes
desc: After the apes suffer unimaginable losses, Caesar wrestles with his darker instincts and begins his own mythic quest to avenge his kind.

name: The Highwaymen
desc: The untold true story of the legendary detectives who brought down Bonnie and Clyde.

name: Savages: The Interrogations
desc: California entrepreneurs Ben and Chon, run a lucrative business raising marijuana and share a unique love with beautiful O. Life is idyllic, until Elena, the merciless leader of the Mexican Baja Cartel, demands a piece of the action.

name: Wall Street
desc: An impatient young stockbroker is willing to do anything to get to the top, including trading on illegal inside information taken through a ruthless, greedy corporate raider who takes the youth under his wing.

name: Diarios de motocicleta
desc: The dramatization of a motorcycle road trip Che Guevara went on in his youth that showed him his life's calling.

name: Far and Away
desc: A young Irish couple flee to the States, but subsequently struggle to obtain land and prosper freely.

name: Edge of Tomorrow
desc: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.

name: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
desc: Ethan and his team take on their most impossible mission yet when they have to eradicate an international rogue organization as highly skilled as they are and committed to destroying the IMF.

name: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
desc: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

name: Fatal Attraction
desc: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

name: King of California
desc: An unstable dad who after getting out of a mental institution tries to convince his daughter that there's Spanish gold buried somewhere under suburbia.

name: Project Power
desc: When a pill that gives its users unpredictable superpowers for five minutes hits the streets of New Orleans, a teenage dealer and a local cop must team with an ex-soldier to take down the group responsible for its creation.

name: Memoirs of a Geisha
desc: Nitta Sayuri reveals how she transcended her fishing-village roots and became one of Japan's most celebrated geisha.

name: Basic Instinct
desc: A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.

name: Any Given Sunday
desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

name: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
desc: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

name: The Lives of Others
desc: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

name: The General's Daughter
desc: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

name: The Gentlemen
desc: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

name: Red Dragon
desc: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer. Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.

name: Mercury Rising
desc: Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.

name: Swordfish
desc: A covert counter-terrorist unit called Black Cell led by Gabriel Shear wants the money to help finance their war against international terrorism, but it's all locked away. Gabriel brings in convicted hacker Stanley Jobson to help him.

name: National Lampoon's Vacation
desc: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

name: American Psycho
desc: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

name: Inglourious Basterds
desc: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

name: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
desc: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
desc: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

name: The Devil's Advocate
desc: An exceptionally-adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss--the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

name: Dirty Harry
desc: When a man calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces San Francisco, tough-as-nails Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down the crazed psychopath.

name: Savages
desc: Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.

name: The Firm
desc: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

name: The Salt of the Earth
desc: The life and work of photographer Sebastião Salgado, who has spent forty years documenting societies in hidden corners of the world.

name: Father of the Year
desc: Before NYC, college valedictorian Ben visits his trailer park loser dad. Same evening Ben argues with Larry about whose dad can kick the other dad's ass. Loser dad hears of this and tries to beat up doormat dad and chaos follows.

name: Ben Is Back
desc: A drug addicted teenage boy shows up unexpectedly at his family's home on Christmas Eve.

name: National Parks Adventure
desc: Coinciding with the National Parks Centennial, National Parks Adventure celebrates America's natural wonders. Narrated by Robert Redford, it follows a trio of adventurers and revisits Roosevelt and Muir's camping trip when the Park System was born.

name: Find Me Guilty
desc: In the late 1980s, a low level gangster named Jackie DiNorscio defends himself in court in what became the longest criminal trial in American judicial history.

name: Blade Runner
desc: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

name: Soul Plane
desc: Things get raucously funny aboard the maiden flight of a black-owned airline, thanks to some last-minute passenger additions.

name: 25th Hour
desc: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
desc: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

name: Zodiac
desc: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

name: Runaway Jury
desc: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

name: The Net
desc: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

name: The Princess Bride
desc: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

name: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
desc: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

name: The Help
desc: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

name: Mommy Dead and Dearest
desc: In this documentary, the murder of Deedee Blanchard by her daughter Gypsy Rose is explored, as well as the circumstances leading up to the event.

name: Awakenings
desc: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.

name: The Heartbreak Kid
desc: A newly wed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon.

name: Once Upon a Time in America
desc: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.
